sourcesContent:
const en = { welcome: `
Hey there! ðŸ‘‹
I'm Gio Marco Baglioni, aka akkaz. This is my interactive space where you can explore who I am and what I do.
Here are some things you can do: â€¢ type a command and press Enter â€¢ use 'help' to see commands â€¢ 'about' to learn more â€¢ 'clear' cleans terminal â€¢ â†‘â†“ for command history
`, commandPrompt: "guest@portfolio:~$", commands: { help: { description: "Show available commands", output: `Available commands: help - Show this help message about - Learn about me skills - View my technical skills projects - View my projects contact - Get my contact information clear - Clear the terminal lang - Change language (en/it)`, }, about: { description: "Learn about me", output: `About Me: I'm a software developer with a passion for creating elegant solutions to complex problems. I specialize in full-stack development, with expertise in modern web technologies and cloud architecture. I have experience working with various technologies including: â€¢ Frontend: React, Vue.js, TypeScript â€¢ Backend: Node.js, Python, Java â€¢ Cloud: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes â€¢ Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis Currently working on exciting projects in the web3 space and exploring new technologies.`, }, skills: { description: "View technical skills", output: `Technical Skills: Programming Languages: â€¢ JavaScript/TypeScript â€¢ Python â€¢ Java â€¢ SQL Frontend: â€¢ React.js â€¢ Vue.js â€¢ HTML5/CSS3 â€¢ Responsive Design Backend: â€¢ Node.js â€¢ Express â€¢ Django â€¢ Spring Boot Cloud & DevOps: â€¢ AWS â€¢ Docker â€¢ Kubernetes â€¢ CI/CD Database: â€¢ PostgreSQL â€¢ MongoDB â€¢ Redis â€¢ Elasticsearch`, }, projects: { description: "View my projects", output: `Notable Projects: 1. Interactive Terminal Portfolio (This website!) â€¢ React-based interactive terminal interface â€¢ Custom command processing system â€¢ Responsive design and animations 2. Blockchain Analytics Platform â€¢ Real-time cryptocurrency data analysis â€¢ Advanced charting and visualization â€¢ API integration with multiple exchanges 3. E-commerce Microservices â€¢ Microservices architecture â€¢ Event-driven design â€¢ High-performance caching system 4. AI-Powered Task Manager â€¢ Natural language processing â€¢ Machine learning for task prioritization â€¢ Real-time collaboration features`, }, contact: { description: "Get contact information", output: `Contact Information: Email: gio.marco.baglioni@gmail.com GitHub: github.com/akkaz LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/giomarcobaglioni Feel free to reach out for collaborations or opportunities!`, }, lang: { description: "Change language (en/it)", output: "Language changed to English", }, clear: { description: "Clear the terminal", }, }, errors: { commandNotFound: "Command not found. Type 'help' to see available commands.", genericError: "An error occurred while processing your command.", } }; export default en;
